whatIs.title: What is Fixora?
whatIs.content: Fixora is your all-in-one property management tool. Whether it's your primary home, a vacation cabin, or a rental unit, Fixora helps you organize every detail—accessible anytime from your phone or computer.

why.title: Why Fixora?
why.content: Managing a property is often more complicated than it needs to be. Documents get lost, photos are scattered across devices, and finding technical specs can take hours. Fixora centralizes everything so you can spend less time searching and more time managing.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content:
All Details in One Place
Store addresses, room counts, square footage, and valuations in one organized hub.

Smart Documentation
Keep photos, inspection reports, warranties, and contracts together. It’s like a digital filing cabinet in your pocket.

Visual Portfolio
View all your properties on an integrated map—perfect for owners with multiple locations.

Access Anywhere
Synchronized across mobile and web, your property data is always at your fingertips.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.content: Homeowners, property investors, and anyone who wants to replace chaotic folders with a smarter, digital management system.

approach.title: Our Philosophy
approach.content:
We believe in simplicity. No bloated features—just the essential tools you need to manage your property and find information instantly.

Available on iOS, Android, and Web.

whatIs.title: What is Fixora?
whatIs.content: Fixora is a professional property management and inspection platform designed for real estate agents, property managers, and contractors. We bridge the gap between management and execution through modern digital tools.

why.title: Solving Industry Friction
why.content: Managing portfolios across locations is complex. Outdated spreadsheets and fragmented communication lead to delays. Fixora centralizes property data on a secure, collaborative platform to eliminate these inefficiencies.

whatWeDo.title: Our Solutions
whatWeDo.content:
Centralized Portfolio Management
Track specifications, valuations, and documents without switching tools. Keep your entire team synchronized with real-time updates.

Professional Documentation
Never lose a certificate or report again. Share vital documents instantly with colleagues, lenders, or clients.

Location Intelligence
Use integrated mapping to present portfolios professionally with precise geographical context.

Built for Collaboration
Manage properties at scale with multi-user access and role-based permissions.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.content: Real estate brokerages, property management firms, investment companies, and maintenance professionals who need to manage assets at scale.

approach.title: Efficiency First
approach.content:
Fixora removes administrative friction, allowing you to focus on scaling your business and delivering better results to your clients.

Available on iOS, Android, and Web.
